category-def.name: org.moflon.ide
category-def.label: eMoflon
category-def.description: eMoflon is a tool environment the model-based software development. The structure of systems is described using Ecore-compliant meta-models in Enterprise Architect. A code generator translates the system meta-model into EMF-compliant Java code. Afterwards, instances of the meta-model may be transformed undirectionally (using Story Driven Modeling (SDM)) or bidirectionally (using Triple Graph Grammars (TGGs)).
